protocol.text: Plates were flooded with water or 7 mM dicamba (Cadence 0.325 g/mole, Syngenta) for 40 minutes.  The treatments were poured off and the plates incubated for an additional 9 hr 20 min at RT.

WT (a Columbia line containing a -800GSTF8::LUC reporter) Arabidopsis seeds were surface sterilzed and sown on MS-media plates.  Plates were vernalized 3 days at 4C in dark before being transferred to controlled growth room set at 21ºCwith a 16 hour ligh
RNA was extracted using the Qiagen RNeasy Mini Kit, following the manufacturer’s instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 2 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

cRNA was hybridized to the GeneChip® Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array using a Genechip instrument system with scanner 3000 7G and autoloader for expression array processing and analysis, following manufacturer's protocol.  Labeling, hybing and scanning were
Genechips were scanned Affymetrix GeneChip scanner 3000 7G

The raw data files underwent background correction, normalization, probe specific correction, and summary value computation using the Robust Multichip Average (RMA) method in the Bioconductor package.  To find the differentially expressed genes we utilized the limma package for R to calculate the Log2 fold change, the moderate t-statistic, B value, and the adjusted p value (BenjaminiHochberg FDR) for each array probe.
